name: RockKnight (trijam)
description:
Game made in 3 hours for trijam #22. The story is that of a small rock knight that tries to defend his kingdom from the evil rubies.

Use W to Jump and space to swing your sword at the bad rubies! Don't hit your own kind though!

The game can also be played right here: http://symphoniagames.com/RockKnight/
